arts.ttl: Sources: Galatasaray now considering move for £10m Wolves player
arts.sum: TBR Football can exclusively confirm Galatasaray’s stance towards signing Wolverhampton Wanderers midfielder Mario Lemina. Wolves manager Vitor Pereira confirmed on Wednesday that Mario Lemina is...

arts.ttl: Charlotte FC Nearing Loan Deal for Wilfried Zaha, per Report
arts.sum: Charlotte FC's attack would receive a major boost if they acquire Wilfried Zaha on loan for the 2025 MLS season.
